Rules

  • Site-wide rules always apply here.
  • The rules listed at Marquis/Rules also apply here.
  • Actually read those rules. Any accidental rulebreaking will be treated as if purposeful.
  • This is my font. Do not use it or impersonate me otherwise.
  • Do not talk about this or other ongoing games outside of their official threads.
  • Remember, Mafia is a game! Have fun; at the same time, be respectful of other players and play to your win condition.

  • caledfwitch is the backup moderator for this game. She has access to all necessary information should she need to run the game in my absence.

Timeline

  • One game Day lasts 14 real days.
  • One game Night lasts 2 real days (48 real hours).
  • I reserve the right to extend deadlines at my own discretion. However, a Day will never be extended more than 48 hours past its original deadline.

  • A player who goes 48 hours without posting will be prodded.
  • If you will be on Vacation/Limited Access, please PM me or bold it in-thread. You will not be prodded while V/LA.
  • A player who goes roughly 24 hours without posting after their V/LA (the time as I note it in the votecount) ends will be prodded.
  • Prod timers will reset at the end of each Day.

  • A player who goes a further 24 hours without posting (or replying by PM if it is Night) after a prod will be replaced.
  • Upon a player's third prod, I will immediately begin seeking a replacement, to be instated once their 24 hours is up. Further prods may result in immediate replacement at my own discretion.
  • I will be actively and impartially seeking potential replacement players throughout the game as I feel is needed. Anyone open to replacing in will be placed in a hidden queue, and sent forward in proper order. (If you're reading this and are interested, just let me know to join my replacement queue!)

Setup Information

  • This game was reviewed for normalcy and balance by Antihero, Ether, and mykonian.

  • There are 10 Town players and 3 Mafia players in this game.

  • This game operates under a Double Lynch (also known as Double Day) mechanic. If a lynch is achieved before the timer runs out, a second lynch may also be achieved in the remaining time.
  • If a No Lynch is decided on by majority, the Day will immediately end.
